definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Ion Torrent, he added, would “democratize” sequencing.
sentences.chinese: 离子洪流，他补充说，“民主化”的序列。

sentences.english: Navigating the Age of Democratised Media", at Columbia University, New York on Friday 25 February.
sentences.chinese: 民主化媒体时代的导航”。

sentences.english: But this democratisation carries a burden.
sentences.chinese: 但是这种民主化带来了一种负担。

sentences.english: The movement towards political multi-polarity of the world will be conducive to the democratization of international relations.
sentences.chinese: 世界政治多极化的发展，有利于推动国际关系民主化。

sentences.english: Power relations and its inherent oppression have also been democratized .
sentences.chinese: 权力关系及其所固有的压制性也已被民主化。

sentences.english: In the sphere of theory, destroy the roots of ultra-democracy.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上铲除极端民主化的根苗。

sentences.english: The most pernicious lie in politics is that the press is a democratising force.
sentences.chinese: 在政治中，最有害的谎言是媒体是一个民主化的力量。

sentences.english: This would truly be democratizing development.
sentences.chinese: 这将真正地促进发展的民主化。

sentences.english: Government must propel democratic and lawful construction of public finance.
sentences.chinese: 同时，还必须推进财政的民主化和法治化建设。

sentences.english: Democratization of IR (DIR) is unreversed historic trend.
sentences.chinese: 国际关系民主化是不可逆转的历史潮流。

sentences.english: Do you think China will ever fully democratise ?
sentences.chinese: 您认为中国会实现全面民主化吗？

sentences.english: The first was that economic growth would inevitably -- and fairly swiftly -- lead to democratization.
sentences.chinese: 第一是经济的增长将不可避免并且迅速地导致民主化。

sentences.english: The First Amendment unapologetically nurtures the democratization of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 第一修正案毋庸置疑地养育着民主化知识。

sentences.english: Sub-Saharan Africa is only slowly democratizing.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉以南非洲的民主化进程缓慢。

sentences.english: In the end, countries cannot democratize others.
sentences.chinese: 最后，一个国家不可能民主化别的国家。
